verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa tomāra ihāṅ āilā, pāilā daraśana?
kṛṣṇera uddeśa kahi' rākhaha jīvana

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; tomāra—your; ihāṅ—here; āilā—came; pāilā daraśana—you have seen; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; uddeśa—the direction; kahi'-by telling; rākhaha jīvana—kindly save our lives.
translation: " 'Have you seen Kṛṣṇa coming this way? Kindly tell us which way He has gone and save our lives.'
